dcterms:creator: Nima Khademi Kalantari
Ravi Ramamoorthi
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training and testing HDR imaging methods, consisting of 74 samples for training and 15 samples for testing, each including a ground truth HDR image and three LDR images with different exposure settings.
dcterms:title: HDR dataset

dcterms:creator: Pradeep Sen
Nima Khademi Kalantari
Maziar Yaesoubi
Soheil Darabi
Dan B Goldman
Eli Shechtman
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating HDR reconstruction methods, focusing on robust patch-based HDR reconstruction of dynamic scenes.
dcterms:title: Sen et al.'s dataset

dcterms:creator: Okan Tarhan Tursun
Ahmet Oğuz Akyüz
Aykut Erdem
Erkut Erdem
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating the quality of HDR images, providing an objective deghosting quality metric.
dcterms:title: Tursun et al.'s dataset
